testcase.name: Search for a Product MacBook Pro
testcase.system-out: Given I have search field on Amazon Page....................................passed When I search for a product with name "Apple MacBook Pro" and price 1000....passed Then Product with name "Apple MacBook Pro" should be displayed..............passed

testcase.name: Search for a Product IPhone
